UVCE JAATHRE:
As the name indicates, it's a colourful one day event organised by 2nd year students. During Jaathre various collegiate clubs’ setup their stall at quadrangle of main campus and conduct fun games, thereby helping freshers to know about UVCE. 

KAGADA:
It's a National level technical symposium, organised by Team IEEE UVCE. Students across Bengaluru take part in this event where they get to showcase their Paper and Poster presentation skills the best paper and posters will be awarded. 

FIESTA:
It's a one day intra colligate Cultural fest of UVCE organised by 3rd year students in even semester. It's a Cultural extravaganza which accelerates uvceians to participate in widespread events. Skilled students from every department of UVCE participate in this fest.

CIVISTA:
This event is similar to fiesta but this being celebrated by our friends at JyanaBharathi campus. Civista is the annual Cultural fest of Civil department. Organised by 3rd year students. It attracts huge number of participants from the Bangalore University campus placed in the vicinity of department.

INSPIRON:
Inspiron is an inter college technical fest organized by the Placement & Training office UVCE, it is an entrepreneurship and management extravaganza which has various events that requires one to showcase technical, entrepreneurship and management skills. Happening in even semester. 

IMPETUS:
IMPETUS is our National Level Technical Extravaganza started in the year 2001. IMPETUS is a technical fest designed for a change and with vivid difference. Unlike other fests, every year this fest goes out with a message for the engineers. The fest was themed after Engineering for Society followed by Innovation and Entrepreneurship in 2013. This 2 day long fest has always had a diverse participation from all over the country. Over the years IMPETUS has emerged to be one of Bengaluru's top technical fests. 

ESPORTIVO:
Sports has a high calibre in UVCE. The craze setup for football and cricket is everlasting in the century old college. Esportivo is a week-long event organised by sports geeks to uphold the sportsmanship sprit among various teams across Bengaluru. 

MILAGRO:
MILAGRO is the biggest cultural festival in UVCE organised by final year students which is carried in the duration of a week . With the history of two decades, it provides a platform where every individual in college comes together to create a difference. It upholds the pride of UVCE and culture of Karnataka. It has always been dealt with grandeur and festivity. Participants throughout Karnataka are attracted to this 2 day event. PS:- Rain adds up to the charm of milagro every time.
